title: Is it legal to beat people during a lockdown? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Anything done for public interest or benefit of the country may be justified as legal, like a soldier killing another enemy soldier. Beating people during a lockdown only happens when any person is violating containment order.
It is not legal for the police or other govt. officer to beat people in India.But some times, its far simpler and more effective than making a formal arrest and filing a formal criminal case.
